import string

def main():
    t=int(raw_input())
    for _ in range(t):
        jewel_list=raw_input()
        price_list=[jewel_list.count(c)%2+jewel_list.count(c)/2 for c in string.ascii_lowercase+string.ascii_uppercase]
        print(sum(price_list))
    
        
            
        
if __name__=='__main__':
    main()
